text: Edvard Grimstad (29 March 1933 - 3 April 2014) was a Norwegian politician. He was a member of the Centre Party. He served as an MP from 1989 until 1997. He was born in Råde, Østfold. Grimstad died from natural causes on 3 April 2014 in Oslo. He was 91 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Edvard Grimstad biography Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Norwegian mayors Category:Østfold
title: Edvard Grimstad
